data.text: @jakovanrensburg @gillianoberholzer @shaunviljoen @stefanbar For now we can perhaps add a simple tick box associated to a BF client. Currently this is the only scenario whereby a debit order is not required. This will assist with immediate filtering where we can implement a group filtering system in due course? All new registered BF clients, we can tick and also all historical clients we are aware off. This will at least assist, for now!
